itunes:title: Episode 628 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/30/20 - Is CrossFit Over?
title: Episode 628 - DB Sports Companion Show 06/30/20 - Is CrossFit Over?
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest Baker the Bald Baby to discuss the backstory behind former CrossFit CEO Greg Glassman and why he may have been in over his head. Baker’s got the details and tells personal stories of Andy Stumpf’...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome back special guest Baker the Bald Baby to discuss the backstory behind former CrossFit CEO Greg Glassman and why he may have been in over his head. Baker’s got the details and tells personal stories of Andy Stumpf’s when Andy worked as a personal driver for Glassman. Today’s show highlights the many issues CrossFit and its former CEO had, the cult-like nature of Crossfit, and what the future holds for the sport itself.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros
